value.title: 1 in 10 Americans over 65 have dementia, study finds
value.excerpt: One in 10 Americans over 65 had dementia, while 22% experienced mild cognitive impairment, the earliest stage of the slow slide into senility, according to a new study conducted between 2016 and 2017.
